Total Drainage Area

Source: R/calc_network.R
calculate_total_drainage_area.Rd

Calculates total drainage area given a dendritic network and incremental areas.

calculate_total_drainage_area(x)

Arguments

x

data.frame with ID, toID, and area columns.

Value

numeric with total area.

Examples

calculate_total_drainage_area,Total Drainage Area,Total Drainage Area — calculate_total_drainage_area,Source: R/calc_network.R,calculate_total_drainage_area.Rd,character(0),calculate_total_drainage_area,character(0),list(title = "Description", contents = "
Calculates total drainage area given a dendritic\nnetwork and incremental areas.
"),list(image = list(src = "https://usgs-r.github.io/nhdplusTools/logo.png"), description = "Calculates total drainage area given a dendritic\nnetwork and incremental areas."),calculate_total_drainage_area(x),list(list(name = "x", description = "
data.frame with ID, toID, and area columns.
")),TRUE,
library(dplyr)
source(system.file("extdata", "walker_data.R", package = "nhdplusTools"))
catchment_area <- select(walker_flowline, COMID, AreaSqKM) %>%
  right_join(prepare_nhdplus(walker_flowline, 0, 0,
                            purge_non_dendritic = FALSE, warn = FALSE), by = "COMID") %>%
  select(ID = COMID, toID = toCOMID, area = AreaSqKM)

new_da <- calculate_total_drainage_area(catchment_area)

catchment_area$totda <- new_da
catchment_area$nhdptotda <- walker_flowline$TotDASqKM

mean(abs(catchment_area$totda - catchment_area$nhdptotda))

#> [1] 1.633102e-15
max(abs(catchment_area$totda - catchment_area$nhdptotda))

#> [1] 2.842171e-14
